questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A chalk drawing
C) A building
D) A vehicle

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) A chalk drawing of a Glass and straw
D) A playground

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) A chalk drawing
C) A car
D) A bench

What is the chalk drawing depicting?
A) A flower
B) A house
C) A glass with a straw
D) An animal

What expression does the chalk drawing have?
A) Happy
B) Sad
C) Angry
D) Excited

What material is the drawing made with?
A) Paint
B) Chalk
C) Marker
D) Crayon

What is the surface on which the drawing is made?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Sidewalk concrete
D) Wood

What color is the chalk used in the drawing?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) White

What is the drawing's position relative to the sidewalk?
A) On the edge
B) In the middle
C) Near a tree
D) Next to a bench

What additional elements are present in the drawing besides the cup?
A) Trees
B) Animals
C) Arms and a straw
D) Cars

What is the texture of the surface where the drawing is made?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Wet
D) Soft

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Side view
C) Close-up view
D) Distant view

What is the primary material of the drawing tool?
A) Plastic
B) Metal
C) Chalk
D) Wood

What is the primary activity depicted in the photo?
A) Drawing
B) Playing
C) Reading
D) Eating

What is the orientation of the drawing on the sidewalk?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

What is the primary color contrast in the photo?
A) Bright and dark
B) Warm and cool
C) Light and dark
D) Colorful and monochrome

What is the shape of the drawing?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Cylindrical

What is the drawing's relation to the sidewalk cracks?
A) Overlaps with a crack
B) Next to a crack
C) Far from cracks
D) Parallel to cracks

What is the drawing's level of detail?
A) Highly detailed
B) Moderately detailed
C) Simple
D) Complex

What is the primary visual element in the photo?
A) Colors
B) Glass Shapes
C) Textures
D) Lines

What is the primary artistic technique used in the drawing?
A) Shading
B) Outlining
C) Blending
D) Stippling

What is depicted in the drawing?
A) A car
B) A house
C) A drink with a straw and arms
D) A landscape
